mapper.insert: insert into sample_cart_items (item_no, user_id, product_no) values (cartItem_seq.nextval, #{userId}, #{productNo})
mapper.select: select item_no no, user_id userId, product_no productNo, item_amount amount, item_created_date createdDate from sample_cart_items where user_id = #{userId} and product_no = #{productNo}

select A.item_no as itemNo, A.item_amount as amount, B.product_no as productNo, B.product_name as name, B.product_price as price, B.product_discount_price as discountPrice, A.item_amount * B.product_discount_price as orderPrice from sample_cart_items A, sample_products B where A.product_no = B.product_no and A.user_id = #{value} order by B.product_name asc
